io.janusproject.kernel

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.kernel.Kernel

  • public class Kernel
extends Object
    This class represents the Kernel of the Janus platform.

    The Kernel is a singleton.

    The Kernel is assimilated to an agent that is omniscient and distributed other the network. It is containing all the other agents.

    To create a Kernel, you should use the function Kernel.create(Module...).

    Version:
    0.7.0-SNAPSHOT 2017-10-05 16:28:07
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin
